Class NordicFeedApplication

java.lang.Object

public class NordicFeedApplication
extends java.lang.Object

MAIN APPLICATION CLASS Main method can receive arguments directly from java command line or actions will be set by GUI.

Author:
Mike Sioda

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

runProgram

public static void runProgram(java.lang.String userAction)
Main work method. Analyze action value & execute 1. Data Feed. 2. Archive. 3. Database Load. 4. Show Screen (search or command).

Parameters:
userAction -

quitProgram

public static void quitProgram()
Quit the applications. 1. Call cleanUp() 2. Play program complete wav. 3. Print stats to log & report files.

private static void init(java.lang.String[] args)
Initilize the follwing: 1. Load property file class into memory. 2. Set action if input in main method. 3. Create output directories if needed. 4. Print properties to log.
